00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECOLUMNIT1BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECOLUMNIT1BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageColumnIterator1bp
00038 {
00043         class CIntermediateType
00044         {
00046                 UINT8** m_ppCurrByte;
00048                 int* m_pPixelIndexInByte;
00049                 public:
00051                 inline CIntermediateType(int* pCurr, UINT8** ppBegin):m_pPixelIndexInByte(pCurr),m_ppCurrByte(ppBegin){}
00053                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(const CIntermediateType& Obj)
00054                 {
00055                         *m_ppCurrByte=*Obj.m_ppCurrByte;*m_pPixelIndexInByte=*Obj.m_pPixelIndexInByte;return *this;
00056                 }
00062                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(UINT32 Color){
00063                         (Color ? (*(*m_ppCurrByte+(*m_pPixelIndexInByte>>3)) |= (0x80>>(*m_pPixelIndexInByte%8))) : 
00064                                         (*(*m_ppCurrByte+(*m_pPixelIndexInByte>>3)) &= (0xff7f>>((*m_pPixelIndexInByte%8)))));
00065                         return *this;
00066                 };
00074                 inline operator UINT32()
00075                 {
00076                         return ((*(*m_ppCurrByte+(*m_pPixelIndexInByte>>3))) & (0x80>>(*m_pPixelIndexInByte%8)) )!=0;
00077                 }
00079                 inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i)
00080                 {
00081                         return ((*(*m_ppCurrByte+((*m_pPixelIndexInByte+i)>>3))) & (0x80>>((*m_pPixelIndexInByte+i)%8)) )!=0;
00082                 }
00083         };
00084 protected: // attributes
00086         const TImage* m_pTImg;
00090     int m_PixelIndexInByte;
00093         UINT8* m_pCurrByte;
00095         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00098         CIntermediateType m_IntermediateType;
00099 public:
00106         inline CImageColumnIterator1bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex, const TImage* pTImg);
00108         inline CImageColumnIterator1bp& operator=(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& It);
00111         inline CImageColumnIterator1bp End() const;
00116         inline CImageColumnIterator1bp& operator++() {m_pCurrByte-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return *this; }
00118         inline CIntermediateType& operator*(){return m_IntermediateType;}
00120         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return m_IntermediateType[i];}
00123         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q);
00126         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q);
00129         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q);
00130 };
00131 
00132 inline CImageColumnIterator1bp::CImageColumnIterator1bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex,
00133                                                                                                                         const TImage* pTImg):
00134                 m_pTImg(pTImg), m_PixelIndexInByte(ColumnIndex%8),
00135                 m_pCurrByte(pTImg->ppAllScanLines[StartIndex]+(ColumnIndex>>3)), m_IntermediateType(&m_PixelIndexInByte,&m_pCurrByte),
00136                 m_pEnd(m_pCurrByte-pTImg->ByteWidth*(MaxIndex-StartIndex))
00137 {
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 inline CImageColumnIterator1bp& CImageColumnIterator1bp::operator=(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& It)
00142 {
00143         m_pTImg = It.m_pTImg;
00144         m_PixelIndexInByte  = It.m_PixelIndexInByte;
00145         m_pCurrByte = It.m_pCurrByte;
00146         m_pEnd   = It.m_pEnd;
00147         m_IntermediateType = It.m_IntermediateType;
00148         return *this;
00149 }
00150 
00151 inline CImageColumnIterator1bp CImageColumnIterator1bp::End() const
00152 {
00153         CImageColumnIterator1bp t = *this;
00154         t.m_pCurrByte = m_pEnd;
00155         return t;
00156 }
00157 
00158 inline bool operator==(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q)
00159 {
00160         return (p.m_pCurrByte==q.m_pCurrByte);
00161 }
00162 
00163 inline bool operator!=(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q)
00164 {
00165         return !(p==q);
00166 }
00167 
00168 inline bool operator<(const CImageColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator1bp& q)
00169 {
00170         return (p.m_pCurrByte<q.m_pCurrByte);
00171 }
00172 
00173 } // end namespace ipl
